answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Diana, we have setup a Process Improvement Practitioners group here on the Knowledge Network to supplement your face-to-face activities here in the District.  Please direct any interested parties to http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/groups/group/1129
I hope you are able to initiate an active and engaged community of interest.

author: Diana Artemis
text: Would any DC-area Process Improvement Practitioners be interested in forming a Community of Interest to discuss what works/what doesn't work in creating a continuous PI culture and achieving results?  Please contact Diana Artemis at Arlington County Government in Virginia:  dartemis@arlingtonva.us
title: Any DC-area Process Improvement Practitioners interested in forming a Community of Interest?
